A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It stomped on the graves of the original trilogy. It took everything in new bizarre directions-like Leia's brand new ability to fly through space with her hand or Luke's new ability to make holograms of himself appear all across the galaxy. The tone of the film and the placement of jokes feels like a Marvel film rather than a Star Wars film. Not to mention the fact that the film reads like political propaganda.
